panels.title: Logic App | Get Prediction API Runs

azureLogAnalytics.query:
exceptions
| where cloud_RoleName has "<LOGIC_APP_RESOURCE_NAME>"
| summarize count() by type, problemId, outerMessage
| order by count_ desc
| take 20

traces
| where cloud_RoleName has "<LOGIC_APP_RESOURCE_NAME>"
| where severityLevel >= 3
| project timestamp, severityLevel, message, operation_Name
| order by timestamp desc
| take 50

requests
| summarize
    P50=percentile(duration, 50),
    P95=percentile(duration, 95),
    Count=count()
  by bin(timestamp, $__interval), name
| order by timestamp asc

panels.title: App Insights | Request Duration by Endpoint

azureLogAnalytics.query:
requests
| summarize
    P50=percentile(duration, 50),
    P95=percentile(duration, 95),
    Count=count()
  by bin(timestamp, $__interval), name
| order by timestamp asc

requests
| where cloud_RoleName has "<APIM_RESOURCE_NAME>"
| summarize
    P50=percentile(duration, 50),
    P95=percentile(duration, 95),
    P99=percentile(duration, 99)
  by bin(timestamp, $__interval)
| order by timestamp asc

requests
| where cloud_RoleName has "<APIM_RESOURCE_NAME>"
| where success == false
| where operation_Name contains "road-gritting-predictor"
| summarize Count=count() by resultCode, name, operation_Name
| order by Count desc
| take 20

dependencies
| where target has "open-meteo" or name has "open-meteo" or data has "open-meteo"
| summarize
    P50=percentile(duration, 50),
    P95=percentile(duration, 95),
    P99=percentile(duration, 99)
  by bin(timestamp, $__interval)
| order by timestamp asc

dependencies
| where target has "open-meteo" or name has "open-meteo" or data has "open-meteo"
| summarize
    Success=countif(success == true),
    Failure=countif(success == false)
  by bin(timestamp, $__interval)
| order by timestamp asc

dependencies
| where success == false and type != "Azure table"
| summarize Count=count() by type, target, name, resultCode
| order by Count desc
| take 20
